title: New Patch Not Downloading Past 33%
body: I have tried to use the forum as help and also trouble shooting as well as uninstall and re-install. Anyone have any suggestions as to why I can not download the new patch?

replies.body: At this level, the patcher is trying to download files and apply updates.  A network issue can end up getting you stuck at the patcher or an unspecified error.  To get this fixed up, go over our troubleshooting steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  Let me know if you have any questions!
